q: The letter must have come from the State Department itself, Donald Rumsfeld says.`` How could anyone believe that you couldn't remember if you delivered a letter from Ronald Reagan to Saddam Hussein ?'' he says. That's the kind of thing that persuaded me to take my time and look at the documents, since I had so many of them.
